Classes/QiscusTextConfiguration.html#/s:.name: emptyMessage
Classes/QiscusTextConfiguration.html#/s:.abstract: Your text to show as subtitle if there isn’t any message, Default value : Let’s write message to start conversation

Classes/QiscusTextConfiguration.html#/s:.abstract: Your text to show as title if there isn’t any message, Default value : Welcome

Classes/QiscusTextConfiguration.html#/s:.name: chatTitle
Classes/QiscusTextConfiguration.html#/s:.abstract: Your text to show as title chat, Default value : Title

Classes/QiscusTextConfiguration.html#/s:.name: chatSubtitle
Classes/QiscusTextConfiguration.html#/s:.abstract: Your text to show as subtitle chat, Default value : Sub Title

Classes/QiscusTextConfiguration.html#/s:.name: readOnlyText
Classes/QiscusTextConfiguration.html#/s:.abstract: Your text if you set chat read only, Default value : Archieved message: This message was locked. Click the key to open the conversation.

Classes/QiscusTextConfiguration.html#/s:.name: textPlaceholder

Classes/QiscusTextConfiguration.html#/s:.abstract: Undocumented

Classes/QiscusTextConfiguration.html#/s:.name: galeryAccessAlertTitle

Classes/QiscusTextConfiguration.html#/s:.name: galeryAccessAlertText

Classes/QiscusTextConfiguration.html#/s:.name: microphoneAccessAlertText
Classes/QiscusTextConfiguration.html#/s:.abstract: Undocumented

Classes/QiscusTextConfiguration.html#/s:.name: confirmationImageUploadText

Classes/QiscusTextConfiguration.html#/s:.name: confirmationFileUploadText

Classes/QiscusTextConfiguration.html#/s:.name: alertOkText

Classes/QiscusTextConfiguration.html#/s:.name: alertCancelText

Classes/QiscusTextConfiguration.html#/s:.name: alertSettingText

Classes/QiscusTextConfiguration.html#/s:.name: todayText

Classes/QiscusTextConfiguration.html#/s:.name: uploadingText
Classes/QiscusTextConfiguration.html#/s:.abstract: Your text if it is the process of uploading file, Default value : Uploading

Classes/QiscusTextConfiguration.html#/s:.name: downloadingText
Classes/QiscusTextConfiguration.html#/s:.abstract: Your text if it is the process of uploading file, Default value : Uploading

Classes/QiscusTextConfiguration.html#/s:.name: sendingText

Classes/Qiscus.html#/s:6QiscusAAC12iClou.name: iCloudUpload
Classes/Qiscus.html#/s:6QiscusAAC12iClou.abstract: iCloud Config, by default is disable/false. You need to setup icloud capabilities then create container in your developer account.

Classes/Qiscus.html#/s:6QiscusAAC12camer.name: cameraUpload
Classes/Qiscus.html#/s:6QiscusAAC12camer.abstract: Set camera upload to upload photo/video inside chat View, by default is enable/true.

Classes/Qiscus.html#/c:@M@Qiscus@objc(cs.name: disableInAppNotif()
Classes/Qiscus.html#/c:@M@Qiscus@objc(cs.abstract: Class function to disable notification when In App, by default is true

Classes/Qiscus.html#/c:@M@Qiscus@objc(cs.name: enableInAppNotif()
Classes/Qiscus.html#/c:@M@Qiscus@objc(cs.abstract: Class function to enable notification when In App, by default is true

Classes/Qiscus.html#/c:@M@Qiscus@objc(cs.name: clear()
Classes/Qiscus.html#/c:@M@Qiscus@objc(cs.abstract: Logout Qiscus and clear all data with this function

Classes/Qiscus.html#/c:@M@Qiscus@objc(cs.name: clearData()
Classes/Qiscus.html#/c:@M@Qiscus@objc(cs.abstract: Remove all database, cache, file in local document, and stop all API request.

Classes/Qiscus.html#/c:@M@Qiscus@objc(cs.name: unRegisterPN()
Classes/Qiscus.html#/c:@M@Qiscus@objc(cs.abstract: Remove your device token from backend, Then you not receiving any Push Notification (Apns nor Pushkit)

Classes/Qiscus.html#/c:@M@Qiscus@objc(cs.name: setBaseURL(withURL:)
Classes/Qiscus.html#/c:@M@Qiscus@objc(cs.abstract: to setup Qiscus URL Server, this method called when you are using dedicated server.

Classes/Qiscus.html#/c:@M@Qiscus@objc(cs.name: setAppId(appId:)
Classes/Qiscus.html#/c:@M@Qiscus@objc(cs.abstract: Set App ID, when you are using nonce auth you need to setup App ID before get nounce

Classes/Qiscus.html#/c:@M@Qiscus@objc(cs.name: showChatAlert(alertController:)
Classes/Qiscus.html#/c:@M@Qiscus@objc(cs.abstract: Class function to show alert in chat with UIAlertController

Classes/Qiscus.html#/c:@M@Qiscus@objc(cs.name: setGradientChatNavigation(_:bottomColor:tintColor:)
Classes/Qiscus.html#/c:@M@Qiscus@objc(cs.abstract: Class function to set color chat navigation with gradient

Classes/Qiscus.html#/c:@M@Qiscus@objc(cs.name: setNavigationColor(_:tintColor:)
Classes/Qiscus.html#/c:@M@Qiscus@objc(cs.abstract: Class function to set color chat navigation without gradient

Classes/Qiscus.html#/c:@M@Qiscus@objc(cs.name: iCloudUploadActive(_:)
Classes/Qiscus.html#/c:@M@Qiscus@objc(cs.abstract: Class function to set upload from iCloud active or not

Classes/Qiscus.html#/c:@M@Qiscus@objc(cs.name: pushRegistry(_:didUpdate:for:)
Classes/Qiscus.html#/c:@M@Qiscus@objc(cs.abstract: Device will be generate an device token, then register to qiscus

Classes/Qiscus.html#/c:@M@Qiscus@objc(cs.name: pushRegistry(_:didReceiveIncomingPushWith:for:)
Classes/Qiscus.html#/c:@M@Qiscus@objc(cs.abstract: Forward you Push Notification payload to Qiscus SDK, then Qiscus will be filter the content.

Classes/Qiscus.html#/c:@M@Qiscus@objc(cs.name: pushRegistry(_:didInvalidatePushTokenFor:)
Classes/Qiscus.html#/c:@M@Qiscus@objc(cs.abstract: Phone no longer receive push notif, then qiscus will be register notification to the client

Classes/Qiscus.html#/c:@M@Qiscus@objc(cs.name: setup(withUserIdentityToken:delegate:)
Classes/Qiscus.html#/c:@M@Qiscus@objc(cs.abstract: Qiscus Setup with identity token, 2nd call method after you call getNounce. Response from you backend then putback in to Qiscus Server
